targets.query: SELECT mean("min1") FROM "load" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min5") FROM "load" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "load" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "processcount" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("cpucore") FROM "load" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("enp0s25.rx")/mean("enp0s25.time_since_update")*8 FROM "network" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("enp0s25.tx")/mean("enp0s25.time_since_update")*8 FROM "network" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "memswap" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "memswap" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("sda2.read_bytes")/mean("sda2.time_since_update")*8 FROM "diskio" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sda2.write_bytes")/mean("sda2.time_since_update")*8 FROM "diskio" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.used") FROM "fs" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.size") FROM "fs" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.percent") FROM "fs" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("/boot/efi.percent") FROM "fs" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("ctx_switches") / mean("time_since_update") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("interrupts") / mean("time_since_update") FROM "cpu" WHERE "server" = '/^$Server$/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.name: Server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "server"
